name: Hoppers (joanliqui)
description:
Grab a friend and start hopping in this platformer game! Run and jump as fast as you can to survive longer than your buddy/enemy/parent/....pet?

  • Using your abilites to leave your opponent out of the game is the best way to lose all your friends!
  • New Characters; Next: Boltz,  can't prepare a coffee    
  • New Biomes
  • Solo Game Mode
  • Joel Viladiu (Artstation)
  • Liam Viladiu (Artstation)
  • Joan Liñan (My Itch.io)
